review: Solid.  Delivered on time/quickly in the xmas shipping season and works fine does what it should.Something that might be helpful: I saw that a lot of people were buying a USB cable for this and I wasn't sure what it was going to arrive with.  It came with a standard USB(TV/plug side) to micro USB(for the ROKU side)with an electrical outlet end for the USB just like a phone/tablet/kindle/etc.  My particular TV fired up the USB but only briefly then it powered back down and I had to use the wall outlet. I see no reason that people would be buying an additional USB cable other than to avoid tying it up in a short loop to manage the excess.

review: When I first bought it I was going with the idea that I would be able to use this device to turn a dumb tv into a smart one, that being said I was already aware of the product region blocking certain channels as I live outside the United States this was one of the drawbacks but what I mainly wanted this product for was Netflix which is not region blocked, but to my surprise it is on Roku might I add that Roku is blocking something that shouldn't be region blocked and on top of that the product description said that certain/some channels would be block due to location NOT that over HALF the channels would be blocked this is a total waste of money for anyone living outside the United States and I would not recommend buying it if you do not live there.
